title: Startup Framework
description: You have the design, you have the code

rowLeft.title: Money
rowLeft.description: Startups can save money on design and code and spend it on concept and functionality.

rowLeft.title: Retina Ready
rowLeft.description: Startup Framework works fine on devices supporting Retina Display.

rowLeft.title: Easy to use
rowLeft.description: To get started, you select the desired sample and base the entire website on it.

rowLeft.title: User Guide
rowLeft.description: You’ll get a description of each component and learn how to connect and use them.

rowRight.title: Save your time
rowRight.description: Use your time for generating new ideas for your startup.

rowRight.title: Responsive Layout
rowRight.description: Of course we haven’t forgotten about the responsive layout.

rowRight.title: Clear Grid
rowRight.description: Components fixed to 12 Grid system. It allows you to find understanding between the designer and developer.

rowRight.title: Video Tutorials
rowRight.description: Video tutorials show you how to make a site from design to code.
